Name: Ancient Astra (Discharge)
Desc:
[Enchant Force]
Materializes an arrow of the legends to bombard enemies with a powerful attack.
Additional magic arrows are created from hit enemies. Magic Arrows tracks down the monster with the highest HP first.

H.Old:
Relic Gauge Cost: 65 per sec. Hold the Skill key to attack up to 7 enemies at 400% damage 6 times. 30% chance per attacked enemy to create 2 magic arrows, dealing 240% damage 2 times.
Reduces incoming damage by 60%, including attacks that deal damage based on Max HP percentage while casting.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
H.New:
Relic Gauge Cost: 65 per 1 sec. Periodically attacks up to 7 enemies at 400% Damage 6 times in a row.
Each attacked enemy creates a 30% chance of 2 magic arrows that attack at 240% Damage 2 times.
Damage TAKEN -60% including Max HP-based Damage
Cooldown: 60 sec.
